title: ATypI 2005 Helsinki
content:
Greetings from Finland! The main conference starts in 14 mins!

Photos - [http://www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/tags/atypi2005](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/tags/atypi2005 "http://www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/tags/atypi2005")

News - [http://www.atypi.org/07\_Helsinki/10\_news](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.atypi.org/07_Helsinki/10_news "http://www.atypi.org/07\_Helsinki/10\_news")

Cheers, Si

 [‹ Package Design discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/typophile.com/node/15181 "Go to previous forum topic") [Neue? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/typophile.com/node/15053 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content:
Simon,

Have fun! Try out the Finnish foods! And the Finnish versions of pizza and gyros (kebab).

This link should should work better.  
 [http://www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/atypi2005/pool/")

And check out typeradio and the loudblog archive.  
 [http://www.typeradio.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.typeradio.org/ "http://www.typeradio.org/") -  
 [http://www.typeradio.org/loudblog/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.typeradio.org/loudblog/ "http://www.typeradio.org/loudblog/")

— [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119155203/http:/www.astype.de/)—
Maybe more details about the presentation by Yuri: FontLab Studio 5 for Mac OS X... and by Adam: Full-color bitmap fonts in Adobe Photoshop

Yes, I’d like to hear [a lot] more about Photofonts too!

hhp
